headline: Netflix is about to dominate every holiday with ‘Stranger Things’
summary: Netflix is breaking up the final season into batches releasing on Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year’s Eve—and not everyone’s happy about it.

headline: The 10 highest-paid CEOs
summary: It’s no secret that CEO pay is out of control. A 2024 study from the Economic Policy Institute found that it’s risen an astronomical 1,085% since 1978, compared to a paltry 24% rise in typical workers’ pay.
